name: DisablePartialMatchingTest
description: Tests for disabling partial matching in CommandLineParser.

test_cases.name: testDisablePartialMatching
test_cases.description: Tests that partial matching is disabled by creating a CommandLineParser with partial matching disabled and verifying that both 'debug' and 'extract' options are recognized.

test_cases.name: testRegularPartialMatching
test_cases.description: Tests regular partial matching by creating a CommandLineParser with default settings and verifying that only the 'debug' option is recognized.
